FuncDef: This command specifies the admin groups to be excluded when an LSP is set up in the primary or secondary contexts. Each single operation of the exclude command allows a maximum of five groups to be specified at a time. However, a maximum of 32 groups can be specified per LSP through multiple operations. The admin groups are defined in theconfig>router>if-attribute>admin-groupcontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specify the existing group-name to be excluded when an LSP is set up.
